title: Type Management
content:
Is ther a conflict between ATM Light and Font Book (Panther)?   
   
I've had nothing but problems since the first launch of type book.   
   
It never ceases to amaze me that "desk top publishing" has yet to get it's typographic act together
author: jjubert

comments.content:
Joanne   
Buy Font Agent Pro and you don't need ATM at all!   
It's a great program and works without any problem   
at all in OSX environment. Find out more here:   
 [http://www.insidersoftware.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20051125101110/http:/www.insidersoftware.com/)

Thank you Stephan.   
   
Font Agent Pro is a new one by me,   
I'll look into it.   
   
Just realized that perhaps my not having the latest version of Quark may also be screwing me up.
